"[125-bessy] [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy mused , [his]125-bessy eyes still bent on [his]125-bessy gently - oscillating foot . Whenever a sufficient pressure from without parted the fog of self - complacency in which [he]125-bessy moved , [he]125-bessy had a shrewd enough outlook on [men]265-men and motives ; and it may be that the vigorous ring of [Amherst]96-amherst 's answer had effected this momentary clearing of the air . At any rate , [his]96-amherst next words were spoken in a more accessible tone . " To what conditions do [you]96-amherst refer ? "[96-amherst] " To the conditions under which the [mill]3644-mill - hands work and live -- to the whole management of [the mills]3324-the mills , in fact , in relation to [the people employed]3646-the people employed . "[96-amherst] " That is a large question . "[125-bessy] " [No employer]3649-no employer ? "[125-bessy] " By no means , [sir]3495-sir . "[125-bessy] " And in what respect do [you]96-amherst think [the Westmore hands]141-the westmore hands unfairly treated ? "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst paused to measure [his]96-amherst words . " The question , as [you]96-amherst say , is a large one , "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst rejoined . " It has its roots in the way the business is organized -- in the traditional attitude of [the company]3366-the company toward [the operatives]3426-the operatives . [I]96-amherst hoped that [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore might return to [the mills]3324-the mills -- might visit [some of the people in [[their]3658-some of the people in their houses houses]3659-their houses]3658-some of the people in their houses . "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst was silent , and [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy pursued : " [I]96-amherst gather , from [your]96-amherst bringing up [Dillon]98-dillon 's case , that for some reason [you]96-amherst consider it typical of the defects [you]96-amherst find in [[Mr. Truscomb]105-truscomb 's management]3665-mr. truscomb 's management . "[96-amherst] [He]96-amherst turned , as [he]96-amherst spoke , to extract a cigar from the box at [his]96-amherst elbow . " Let [me]96-amherst offer [you]96-amherst one , [Mr. Amherst]96-amherst : [we]3663-we shall talk more comfortably , "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst suggested with distant affability ; but [Amherst]96-amherst , with a gesture of refusal , plunged into [his]96-amherst exposition of the Dillon case . [He]96-amherst tried to put the facts succinctly , presenting them in their bare ugliness , without emotional drapery ; setting forth [Dillon]98-dillon 's good record for sobriety and skill , dwelling on the fact that [[his]96-amherst wife]3350-his wife 's ill - health was the result of perfectly remediable conditions in [the work - rooms]590-the work - rooms , and giving [his]96-amherst reasons for the belief that the accident had been caused , not by [Dillon]98-dillon 's carelessness , but by the over - crowding of [the carding - room]3357-the carding - room . [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy listened attentively , though the cloud of cigar - smoke between [himself]125-bessy and [Amherst]96-amherst masked from the latter [his]125-bessy possible changes of expression . " Have [you]96-amherst ever called [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines 's attention to these matters ? "[125-bessy] " No : that would have been useless . [He]110-mr. gaines has always refused to discuss the condition of [the mills]3324-the mills with any one but [the manager]3346-the manager . "[125-bessy] " H'm -- that would seem to prove that [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines , who lives [here]3415-here , sees as much reason for trusting [Truscomb]105-truscomb 's judgment as [Mr. Westmore]143-mr. westmore , who delegated [his]143-mr. westmore authority from a distance . "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst did not take this up , and after a pause [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy went on : " [You]96-amherst know , of course , the answers [I]125-bessy might make to such an indictment . As [a lawyer]3669-a lawyer , [I]125-bessy might call [your]96-amherst attention to [the employe]3670-the employe 's waiver of risk , to the strong chances of contributory negligence , and so on ; but happily in this case such arguments are superfluous . [You]96-amherst are apparently not aware that [Dillon]98-dillon 's injury is much slighter than it ought to be to serve [your]96-amherst purpose . [Dr. Disbrow]101-dr. disbrow has just told [us]3671-us that [he]101-dr. disbrow will probably get off with the loss of a finger ; and [I]125-bessy need hardly say that , whatever may have been [Dillon]98-dillon 's own share in causing the accident -- and as to this , as [you]96-amherst admit , opinions differ -- [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore will assume all the expenses of [his]101-dr. disbrow nursing , besides making a liberal gift to [[his]101-dr. disbrow wife]3350-his wife . "[125-bessy] [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy laid down [his]125-bessy cigar and drew forth a silver - mounted note - case . " Here , in fact , "[125-bessy] [he]125-bessy continued , " is a cheque which [she]104-westmore asks [you]96-amherst to transmit , and which , as [I]125-bessy think [you]96-amherst will agree , ought to silence , on [your]96-amherst part as well as [Mrs. Dillon]98-dillon 's , any criticism of [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's dealings with [[her]104-westmore operatives]3673-her operatives . "[125-bessy] The blood rose to [Amherst]96-amherst 's forehead , and [he]96-amherst just restrained [himself]96-amherst from pushing back the cheque which [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy had laid on the table between [them]742-them . " There is no question of criticizing [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's dealings with [[her]104-westmore operatives]3673-her operatives -- as far as [I]125-bessy know , [she]104-westmore has had none as yet , "[125-bessy] [he]125-bessy rejoined , unable to control [his]125-bessy voice as completely as [his]125-bessy hand . " And the proof of it is the impunity with which [[her]104-westmore agents]3675-her agents deceive [her]104-westmore -- in this case , for instance , of [Dillon]98-dillon 's injury . [Dr. Disbrow]101-dr. disbrow , who is [[Mr. Truscomb]105-truscomb 's brother - in - law]3676-mr. truscomb 's brother - in - law , and apt to be influenced by [his]101-dr. disbrow views , assures [you]96-amherst that [the man]3594-the man will get off with the loss of a finger ; but [some one equally competent to speak]3678-some one equally competent to speak told [me]125-bessy last night that [he]3594-the man would lose not only [his]3594-the man hand but [his]3594-the man arm . "[125-bessy] [Amherst]96-amherst 's voice had swelled to a deep note of anger , and with [his]125-bessy tossed hair , and eyes darkening under furrowed brows , [he]125-bessy presented an image of revolutionary violence which deepened the disdain on [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy 's lip . " [Some one equally competent to speak]3678-some one equally competent to speak ? Are [you]96-amherst prepared to name [this anonymous authority]3680-this anonymous authority ? "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst hesitated . " No -- [I]125-bessy shall have to ask [you]96-amherst to take [my]125-bessy word for it , "[125-bessy] [he]125-bessy returned with a shade of embarrassment . " Ah-- "[125-bessy] [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy murmured , giving to the expressive syllable its utmost measure of decent exultation . " [[My]125-bessy dear sir]3681-my dear sir , [your]3681-my dear sir resorting to such arguments convinces [me]125-bessy that nothing is to be gained by prolonging [our]3682-our talk . "[520-the lawyer] * * * * * When , the next morning at about ten , [Mrs. Eustace Ansell]178-mrs. ansell joined [herself]178-mrs. ansell to [the two gentlemen who still lingered over a desultory breakfast in [[Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's dining - room]745-mrs. westmore 's dining - room]744-the two gentlemen who still lingered over a desultory breakfast in mrs. westmore 's dining - room , [she]178-mrs. ansell responded to [their]744-the two gentlemen who still lingered over a desultory breakfast in mrs. westmore 's dining - room greeting with less than [her]178-mrs. ansell usual vivacity . [ Illustration : " No -- [I]178-mrs. ansell shall have to ask [you]744-the two gentlemen who still lingered over a desultory breakfast in mrs. westmore 's dining - room to take [my]178-mrs. ansell word for it . "[178-mrs. ansell] ] It was one of [Mrs. Ansell]178-mrs. ansell 's arts to bring to the breakfast - table just the right shade of sprightliness , a warmth subdued by discretion as the early sunlight is tempered by the lingering coolness of night . [She]178-mrs. ansell was , in short , as fresh , as temperate , as the hour , yet without the concomitant chill which too often marks its human atmosphere : rather [her]178-mrs. ansell soft effulgence dissipated the morning frosts , opening pinched spirits to a promise of midday warmth . But on this occasion a mist of uncertainty hung on [her]178-mrs. ansell smile , and veiled the glance which [she]178-mrs. ansell turned on the contents of the heavy silver dishes successively presented to [her]178-mrs. ansell notice . When , at the conclusion of this ceremony , [the servants]746-the servants had withdrawn , [she]178-mrs. ansell continued for a moment to stir [her]178-mrs. ansell tea in silence , while [her]178-mrs. ansell glance travelled from [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy , sunk in [his]125-bessy morning mail , to [Mr. Langhope]120-mr. langhope , who leaned back resignedly in [his]120-mr. langhope chair , trying to solace [himself]120-mr. langhope with [Hanaford Banner]116-hanaford , till midday should bring [him]120-mr. langhope a sight of the metropolitan press . " [I]178-mrs. ansell suppose [you]120-mr. langhope know , "[178-mrs. ansell] [she]178-mrs. ansell said suddenly , " that [Bessy]125-bessy has telegraphed for [Cicely]130-cicely , and made [her]130-cicely arrangements to stay [here]3415-here another week . "[178-mrs. ansell] [Mr. Langhope]120-mr. langhope 's stick slipped to the floor with the sudden displacement of [[his]120-mr. langhope whole lounging person]747-his whole lounging person , and [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy , removing [his]125-bessy tortoise - shell reading - glasses , put them hastily into [their]748-their case , as though to declare for instant departure . [VI]148-vi BEFORE daylight that same morning [Amherst]96-amherst , dressing by the gas - flame above [his]96-amherst cheap wash - stand , strove to bring some order into [his]96-amherst angry thoughts . It humbled [him]96-amherst to feel [his]96-amherst purpose tossing rudderless on unruly waves of emotion , yet strive as [he]96-amherst would [he]96-amherst could not regain a hold on it . The events of the last twenty - four hours had been too rapid and unexpected for [him]96-amherst to preserve [his]96-amherst usual clear feeling of mastery ; and [he]96-amherst had , besides , to reckon with the first complete surprise of [his]96-amherst senses . [His]96-amherst way of life had excluded [him]96-amherst from all contact with the subtler feminine influences , and the primitive side of the relation left [his]96-amherst imagination untouched . [He]96-amherst was therefore the more assailable by those refined forms of the ancient spell that lurk in delicacy of feeling interpreted by loveliness of face . By [his]96-amherst own choice [he]96-amherst had cut [himself]96-amherst off from all possibility of such communion ; had accepted complete abstinence for that part of [his]96-amherst nature which might have offered a refuge from the stern prose of [his]96-amherst daily task . But [his]96-amherst personal indifference to [his]96-amherst surroundings -- deliberately encouraged as a defiance to the attractions of the life [he]96-amherst had renounced -- proved no defence against this appeal ; rather , the meanness of [his]96-amherst surroundings combined with [his]96-amherst inherited refinement of taste to deepen the effect of [Bessy]125-bessy 's charm . As [he]96-amherst reviewed the incidents of the past hours , a reaction of self - derision came to [his]96-amherst aid . What was this exquisite opportunity from which [he]96-amherst had cut [himself]96-amherst off ? What , to reduce the question to a personal issue , had [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore said or done that , on the part of [a plain woman]756-a plain woman , would have quickened [his]96-amherst pulses by the least fraction of a second ? Why , it was only the old story of the length of [Cleopatra]149-cleopatra 's nose ! Because [her]104-westmore eyes were a heavenly vehicle for sympathy , because [her]104-westmore voice was pitched to thrill the tender chords , [he]96-amherst had been deluded into thinking that [she]104-westmore understood and responded to [his]96-amherst appeal . And [her]104-westmore own emotions had been wrought upon by means as cheap : it was only the obvious , theatrical side of the incident that had affected [her]104-westmore . If [[Dillon]98-dillon 's wife]757-dillon 's wife had been old and ugly , would [she]757-dillon 's wife have been clasped to [[her]757-dillon 's wife employer]672-her employer 's bosom ? A more expert knowledge of the sex would have told [Amherst]96-amherst that such ready sympathy is likely to be followed by as prompt a reaction of indifference . [Luckily Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's course had served as a corrective for [his]96-amherst lack of experience ; [she]104-westmore had even , as it appeared , been at some pains to hasten the process of disillusionment . This timely discipline left [him]96-amherst blushing at [his]96-amherst own insincerity ; for [he]96-amherst now saw that [he]96-amherst had risked [his]96-amherst future not because of [his]96-amherst zeal for the welfare of [the mill - hands]3347-the mill - hands , but because [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's look was like sunshine on [his]96-amherst frozen senses , and because [he]96-amherst was resolved , at any cost , to arrest [her]104-westmore attention , to associate [himself]96-amherst with [her]104-westmore by the only means in [his]96-amherst power . Well , [he]96-amherst deserved to fail with such an end in view ; and the futility of [his]96-amherst scheme was matched by the vanity of [his]96-amherst purpose . In the cold light of disenchantment it seemed as though [he]96-amherst had tried to build an impregnable fortress out of [nursery blocks]760-nursery blocks . How could [he]96-amherst have foreseen anything but failure for so preposterous an attempt ? [His]96-amherst breach of discipline would of course be reported at once to [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines and [Truscomb]105-truscomb ; and [the manager]3346-the manager , already jealous of [[his]3346-the manager assistant]436-his assistant 's popularity with the hands , which was a tacit criticism of [his]3346-the manager own methods , would promptly seize the pretext to be rid of [him]96-amherst . [Amherst]96-amherst was aware that only [his]96-amherst technical efficiency , and [his]96-amherst knack of getting the maximum of work out of [the operatives]3426-the operatives , had secured [him]96-amherst from [Truscomb]105-truscomb 's animosity . From the outset there had been small sympathy between [the two]271-the two ; but the scarcity of [competent and hard - working assistants]765-competent and hard - working assistants had made [Truscomb]105-truscomb endure [him]96-amherst for what [he]96-amherst was worth to [the mills]3324-the mills . Now , however , [his]96-amherst own folly had put the match to [the manager]3346-the manager 's smouldering dislike , and [he]96-amherst saw [himself]96-amherst , in consequence , discharged and black - listed , and perhaps roaming for months in quest of a job . [He]96-amherst knew the efficiency of that far - reaching system of defamation whereby [the employers of labour]768-the employers of labour pursue and punish [the subordinate who incurs [their]768-the employers of labour displeasure]769-the subordinate who incurs their displeasure . In the case of [a mere operative]770-a mere operative this secret persecution often worked complete ruin ; and even to [a man of [Amherst]96-amherst 's worth]771-a man of amherst 's worth it opened the dispiriting prospect of a long struggle for rehabilitation . Deep down , [he]96-amherst suffered most at the thought that [his]96-amherst blow for [the operatives]3426-the operatives had failed ; but on the surface it was the manner of [his]96-amherst failure that exasperated [him]96-amherst . For it seemed to prove [him]96-amherst unfit for the very work to which [he]96-amherst was drawn : that yearning to help [the world]259-the world forward that , in some natures , sets the measure to which the personal adventure must keep step . [Amherst]96-amherst had hitherto felt [himself]96-amherst secured by [his]96-amherst insight and self - control from the emotional errors besetting the way of [the enthusiast]774-the enthusiast ; and behold , [he]96-amherst had stumbled into the first sentimental trap in [his]96-amherst path , and tricked [his]96-amherst eyes with a Christmas - chromo vision of [lovely woman dispensing coals and blankets]775-lovely woman dispensing coals and blankets ! Luckily , though such wounds to [his]96-amherst self - confidence cut deep , [he]96-amherst could apply to [them]776-them the antiseptic of an unfailing humour ; and before [he]96-amherst had finished dressing , the picture of [his]96-amherst wide schemes of social reform contracting to [a blue - eyed philanthropy of cheques and groceries]777-a blue - eyed philanthropy of cheques and groceries , had provoked a reaction of laughter . Perhaps the laughter came too soon , and rang too loud , to be true to the core ; but at any rate it healed the edges of [his]96-amherst hurt , and gave [him]96-amherst a sound surface of composure . But [he]96-amherst could not laugh away the thought of the trials to which [his]96-amherst intemperance had probably exposed [[his]96-amherst mother]396-his mother ; and when , at the breakfast - table , from which [Duplain]138-duplain had already departed , [she]396-his mother broke into praise of [[their]779-their visitor]780-their visitor , it was like a burning irritant on [his]96-amherst wound . " What a face , [John]99-amherst ! Of course [I]396-his mother do n't often see [people of that kind]3737-people of that kind now-- "[396-his mother] the words , falling from [her]396-his mother too simply to be reproachful , wrung [him]96-amherst , for that , all the more--"but [I]396-his mother 'm sure that kind of soft loveliness is rare everywhere ; like a sweet summer morning with the mist on it . [The Gaines girls]3738-the gaines girls , now , are [my]396-his mother idea of the modern type ; very handsome , of course , but [you]3739-you see just _ how _ handsome the first minute . [I]396-his mother like a story that keeps [one]3402-one wondering till the end . It was very kind of [Maria Ansell]123-maria , "[396-his mother] [Mrs. Amherst]117-mrs. amherst wandered happily on , " to come and hunt [me]117-mrs. amherst out yesterday , and [I]117-mrs. amherst enjoyed [our]3741-our quiet talk about old times . But what [I]117-mrs. amherst liked best was seeing [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore -- and , oh , [John]99-amherst , if [she]104-westmore came to live [here]3415-here , what a benediction to [the mills]3324-the mills ! "[117-mrs. amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst was silent , moved most of all by the unimpaired simplicity of heart with which [[his]96-amherst mother]396-his mother could take up past relations , and open [her]396-his mother meagre life to the high visitations of grace and fashion , without a tinge of self - consciousness or apology . " [I]96-amherst shall never be as genuine as that , "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst thought , remembering how [he]96-amherst had wished to have [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore know that [he]96-amherst was of [[her]104-westmore own class]690-her own class . How mixed [our]783-our passions are , and how elastic must be the word that would cover any one of them ! [Amherst]96-amherst 's , at that moment , were all stained with the deep wound to [his]96-amherst self - love . The discolouration [he]96-amherst carried in [his]96-amherst eye made [the mill - village]552-the mill - village seem more than commonly cheerless and ugly as [he]96-amherst walked over to [the office]3467-the office after breakfast . Beyond the grim roof - line of [the factories]346-the factories a dazzle of rays sent upward from banked white clouds the promise of another brilliant day ; and [he]96-amherst reflected that [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore would soon be speeding [home]3405-home to the joy of a gallop over [the plains]788-the plains . Far different was the task that awaited [him]96-amherst -- yet it gave [him]96-amherst a pang to think that [he]96-amherst might be performing it for the last time . In spite of [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy 's assurances , [he]96-amherst was certain that the report of [his]96-amherst conduct must by this time have reached [the President]789-the president , and been transmitted to [Truscomb]105-truscomb ; the latter was better that morning , and the next day [he]96-amherst would doubtless call [[his]96-amherst rebellious assistant]790-his rebellious assistant to account . [Amherst]96-amherst , meanwhile , took up [his]96-amherst routine with a dull heart . Even should [his]96-amherst offense be condoned , [his]96-amherst occupation presented , in itself , little future to [a man without money or powerful connections]791-a man without money or powerful connections . Money ! [He]96-amherst had spurned the thought of it in choosing [his]96-amherst work , yet [he]96-amherst now saw that , without its aid , [he]96-amherst was powerless to accomplish the object to which [his]96-amherst personal desires had been sacrificed . [His]96-amherst love of [his]96-amherst craft had gradually been merged in the larger love for [[his]96-amherst fellow - workers]792-his fellow - workers , and in the resulting desire to lift and widen [their]792-his fellow - workers lot . [He]96-amherst had once fancied that this end might be attained by an internal revolution in the management of [the Westmore mills]3336-the westmore mills ; that [he]96-amherst might succeed in creating an industrial object - lesson conspicuous enough to point the way to wiser law - making and juster relations between [the classes]794-the classes . But the last hours ' experiences had shown [him]96-amherst how vain it was to assault single - handed the strong barrier between money and labour , and how [his]96-amherst own dash at the breach had only thrust [him]96-amherst farther back into the obscure ranks of [the stragglers]795-the stragglers . It was , after all , only through politics that [he]96-amherst could return successfully to the attack ; and financial independence was the needful preliminary to a political career . If [he]96-amherst had stuck to the law [he]96-amherst might , by this time , have been nearer [his]96-amherst goal ; but then the gold might not have mattered , since it was only by living among [the workers]349-the workers that [he]96-amherst had learned to care for [their]349-the workers fate . And rather than have forfeited that poignant yet mighty vision of the onward groping of the mass , rather than have missed the widening of [his]96-amherst own nature that had come through sharing [their]349-the workers hopes and pains , [he]96-amherst would still have turned from the easier way , have chosen the deeper initiation rather than the readier attainment . But this philosophic view of the situation was a mere thread of light on the farthest verge of [his]96-amherst sky : much nearer were the clouds of immediate care , amid which [his]96-amherst own folly , and [[his]96-amherst mother]396-his mother 's possible suffering from it , loomed darkest ; and these considerations made [him]96-amherst resolve that , if [his]96-amherst insubordination were overlooked , [he]96-amherst would swallow the affront of a pardon , and continue for the present in the mechanical performance of [his]96-amherst duties . [He]96-amherst had just brought [himself]96-amherst to this leaden state of acquiescence when [one of [the clerks in [the outer office]800-the outer office]799-the clerks in the outer office]798-one of the clerks in the outer office thrust [his]96-amherst head in to say : " [A lady]3707-a lady asking for [you--]96-amherst "[96-amherst] and looking up , [Amherst]96-amherst beheld [Bessy Westmore]122-bessy . [She]122-bessy came in alone , with an air of high self - possession in marked contrast to [her]122-bessy timidity and indecision of the previous day . [Amherst]96-amherst thought [she]122-bessy looked taller , more majestic ; so readily may the upward slant of a soft chin , the firmer line of yielding brows , add a cubit to [the outward woman]801-the outward woman . [Her]122-bessy aspect was so commanding that [he]96-amherst fancied [she]122-bessy had come to express [her]122-bessy disapproval of [his]96-amherst conduct , to rebuke [him]96-amherst for lack of respect to [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy ; but a moment later it became clear , even to [his]96-amherst inexperienced perceptions , that it was not to [himself]96-amherst that [her]122-bessy challenge was directed . [She]122-bessy advanced toward the seat [he]96-amherst had moved forward , but in [her]122-bessy absorption forgot to seat [herself]122-bessy , and stood with [her]122-bessy clasped hands resting on the back of the chair . " [I]122-bessy have come back to talk to [you]96-amherst , "[122-bessy] [she]122-bessy began , in [her]122-bessy sweet voice with its occasional quick lift of appeal . " [I]122-bessy knew that , in [Mr. Truscomb]105-truscomb 's absence , it would be hard for [you]96-amherst to leave [the mills]3324-the mills , and there are one or two things [I]122-bessy want [you]96-amherst to explain before [I]122-bessy go away -- some of the things , for instance , that [you]96-amherst spoke to [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy about last night . "[122-bessy] [Amherst]96-amherst 's feeling of constraint returned . " [I]96-amherst 'm afraid [I]96-amherst expressed [myself]96-amherst badly ; [I]96-amherst may have annoyed [him--]125-bessy "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst began . [She]122-bessy smiled this away , as though irrelevant to the main issue . " Perhaps [you]96-amherst do n't quite understand [each other]407-each other -- but [I]122-bessy am sure [you]96-amherst can make it clear to [me]122-bessy . "[122-bessy] [She]122-bessy sank into the chair , resting one arm on the edge of the desk behind which [he]96-amherst had resumed [his]96-amherst place . " That is the reason why [I]122-bessy came alone , "[122-bessy] [she]122-bessy continued . " [I]122-bessy never can understand when [a lot of [people]3450-people]3747-a lot of people are trying to tell [me]122-bessy a thing all at once . And [I]122-bessy do n't suppose [I]122-bessy care as much as [a man]3349-a man would -- [a lawyer]3669-a lawyer especially -- about the forms that ought to be observed . All [I]122-bessy want is to find out what is wrong and how to remedy it . "[122-bessy] [Her]122-bessy blue eyes met [Amherst]96-amherst 's in a look that flowed like warmth about [his]96-amherst heart . How should [he]96-amherst have doubted that [her]122-bessy feelings were as exquisite as [her]122-bessy means of expressing them ? The iron bands of distrust were loosened from [his]96-amherst spirit , and [he]96-amherst blushed for [his]96-amherst cheap scepticism of the morning . In [a woman so evidently nurtured in dependence]802-a woman so evidently nurtured in dependence , whose views had been formed , and [her]122-bessy actions directed , by the most conventional influences , the mere fact of coming alone to [Westmore]104-westmore , in open defiance of [[her]122-bessy advisers]803-her advisers , bespoke a persistence of purpose that put [his]96-amherst doubts to shame . " It will make a great difference to [the people here]3751-the people here if [you]122-bessy interest [yourself]122-bessy in [them]3751-the people here , "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst rejoined . " [I]122-bessy tried to explain to [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy that [I]122-bessy had no wish to criticise [the business management of [the mills]3324-the mills]3752-the business management of the mills -- even if there had been any excuse for [my]122-bessy doing so -- but that [I]122-bessy was sure the condition of [the operatives]3426-the operatives could be very much improved , without permanent harm to the business , by [any one who felt a personal sympathy for [them]3426-the operatives]3755-any one who felt a personal sympathy for them ; and in the end [I]122-bessy believe such sympathy produces better work , and so benefits [the employer]3416-the employer materially . "[122-bessy] [She]122-bessy listened with [her]122-bessy gentle look of trust , as though committing to [him]96-amherst , with the good faith of [a child]804-a child , [her]122-bessy ignorance , [her]122-bessy credulity , [her]122-bessy little rudimentary convictions and [her]122-bessy little tentative aspirations , relying on [him]96-amherst not to abuse or misdirect [them]805-them in the boundless supremacy of [his]96-amherst masculine understanding . " That is just what [I]122-bessy want [you]96-amherst to explain to [me]122-bessy , "[122-bessy] [she]122-bessy said . " But first [I]122-bessy should like to know more about [the poor man who was hurt]3757-the poor man who was hurt . [I]122-bessy _ did _ go to [the hospital]3333-the hospital ; but [the man]3594-the man was sleeping -- is [Dillon]98-dillon [his]3594-the man name?--and [the matron]261-the matron told [us]3762-us [he]3594-the man was much better . "[122-bessy] [Amherst]96-amherst smiled . " [Ah]3764-ah -- [Mr. Truscomb]105-truscomb heard that ? Well , [he]105-truscomb 's right to be annoyed : [I]96-amherst ought not to have said it when [I]96-amherst did . But unfortunately [I]96-amherst am not the only one to be punished . [The operative who tied on the black cloth]3765-the operative who tied on the black cloth was dismissed this morning . "[96-amherst] [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore flamed up . " Dismissed for that ? "[104-westmore] " [You]104-westmore must look at both sides of the case , "[96-amherst] said [Amherst]96-amherst , finding it much easier to remain temperate in the glow [he]96-amherst had kindled than if [he]96-amherst had had to force [his]96-amherst own heat into frozen veins . " Of course any act of insubordination must be reprimanded -- but [I]96-amherst think a reprimand would have been enough . "[96-amherst] It gave [him]96-amherst an undeniable throb of pleasure to find that [she]104-westmore was not to be checked by such arguments . " But [he]3594-the man shall be put back -- [I]96-amherst wo n't have [any one]3517-any one discharged for such a reason ! If [he]3594-the man were taken back [he]3594-the man might be made to suffer . "[104-westmore] " Certainly not ; there are too many cards in [that room]3769-that room . [I]104-westmore pointed out the fact to [Mr. Truscomb]105-truscomb when the new machines were set up three years ago . "[104-westmore] " To make it pay better , "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst returned bluntly ; and the colour flushed [her]104-westmore sensitive skin . "[104-westmore] " But [Mr. Tredegar]125-bessy said [you]96-amherst refused to say who told [you]96-amherst . "[96-amherst] " [I]104-westmore was bound to , as it happened . "[104-westmore] " Ah-- "[806-you] [she]806-you murmured understandingly ; and , a sudden thought striking [him]96-amherst , [he]96-amherst went on , with a glance at the clock : " If [you]806-you really wish to judge for [yourself]806-you , why not go to [the hospital]3333-the hospital now ? "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst had remembered [the nurse]260-the nurse 's cry of recognition when [she]260-the nurse saw [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's face under the street - lamp ; and it immediately occurred to [him]96-amherst that , if [the two women]808-the two women had really known [each other]407-each other , [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore would have no difficulty in obtaining the information [she]104-westmore wanted ; while , even if [they]808-the two women met as [strangers]810-strangers , [the dark - eyed girl]811-the dark - eyed girl 's perspicacity might still be trusted to come to [their]808-the two women aid . " To [the hospital]3333-the hospital -- now ? [Her]104-westmore enquiries , [he]96-amherst noticed , did not extend from the particular to [the general]399-the general : [her]104-westmore curiosity , as yet , was too purely personal and emotional to lead to any larger consideration of the question . But this larger view might grow out of the investigation of [Dillon]98-dillon 's case ; and meanwhile [Amherst]96-amherst 's own purposes were momentarily lost in the sweet confusion of feeling [her]104-westmore near [him]96-amherst -- of seeing the exquisite grain of [her]104-westmore skin , the way [her]104-westmore lashes grew out of a dusky line on the edge of the white lids , the way [her]104-westmore hair , stealing in spirals of light from brow to ear , wavered off into a fruity down on the edge of the cheek . At [the hospital]3333-the hospital [they]817-they were protestingly admitted by [Mrs. Ogan]102-mrs. ogan , though the official " visitors ' hour "[102-mrs. ogan] was not till the afternoon ; and beside [[the sufferer]257-the sufferer 's bed]819-the sufferer 's bed , [Amherst]96-amherst saw again that sudden flowering of compassion which seemed the key to [[his]96-amherst companion]284-his companion 's beauty : as though [her]104-westmore lips had been formed for consolation and [her]104-westmore hands for tender offices . It was clear enough that [Dillon]98-dillon , still sunk in a torpor broken by feverish tossings , was making no perceptible progress toward recovery ; and [Mrs. Ogan]102-mrs. ogan was reduced to murmuring some technical explanation about the state of the wound while [Bessy]125-bessy hung above [him]96-amherst with reassuring murmurs as to [[his]96-amherst wife]3350-his wife 's fate , and promises that [the children]3618-the children should be cared for . "[102-mrs. ogan] " Do [you]102-mrs. ogan really think [they]3329-a surgical nurse sent [her]100-justine away for talking to [you]102-mrs. ogan ? "[125-bessy] " [I]96-amherst waited for [her]100-justine last night when [she]100-justine left [the hospital]3333-the hospital , and [I]96-amherst suppose [Mrs. Ogan]102-mrs. ogan or [one of [the doctors]3800-the doctors]3799-one of the doctors saw [us]3801-us . It was thoughtless of [me]96-amherst , "[96-amherst] [Amherst]96-amherst exclaimed with compunction . " [I]96-amherst wish [I]96-amherst had seen [her]100-justine -- poor [Justine]100-justine ! "[96-amherst] For a moment [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's mind continued to linger among [her]104-westmore memories ; then [she]104-westmore reverted to the question of [the Dillons]142-the dillons , and of what might best be done for [them]142-the dillons if [Miss Brent]97-miss brent 's fears should be realized . "[104-westmore] [VII AMHERST]152-vii amherst could never afterward regain a detailed impression of the weeks that followed . [They]835-they lived in [his]296-her companion memory chiefly as exponents of the unforeseen , nothing [he]296-her companion had looked for having come to pass in the way or at the time expected ; while the whole movement of life was like the noon - day flow of a river , in which the separate ripples of brightness are all merged in one blinding glitter . [His]296-her companion recurring conferences with [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore formed , as it were , the small surprising kernel of fact about which sensations gathered and grew with the swift ripening of [a magician]836-a magician 's fruit . That [she]104-westmore should remain on at [Hanaford]1-hanaford to look into the condition of [the mills]3324-the mills did not , in itself , seem surprising to [Amherst]96-amherst ; for [his]96-amherst short phase of doubt had been succeeded by an abundant inflow of faith in [her]104-westmore intentions . It satisfied [his]96-amherst inner craving for harmony that [her]104-westmore face and spirit should , after all , so corroborate and complete [each other]407-each other ; that it needed no moral sophistry to adjust [her]104-westmore acts to [her]104-westmore appearance , [her]104-westmore words to the promise of [her]104-westmore smile . But [her]104-westmore immediate confidence in [him]96-amherst , [her]104-westmore resolve to support [him]96-amherst in [his]96-amherst avowed insubordination , to ignore , with the royal license of [her]104-westmore sex , all that was irregular and inexpedient in asking [his]96-amherst guidance while the whole official strength of [the company]3366-the company darkened the background with a gathering storm of disapproval -- this sense of being the glove flung by [her]104-westmore hand in the face of convention , quickened astonishingly the flow of [Amherst]96-amherst 's sensations . It was as though [a mountain - climber , braced to the strain of a hard ascent]840-a mountain - climber , braced to the strain of a hard ascent , should suddenly see the way break into roses , and level itself in a path for [his]96-amherst feet . On [his]96-amherst second visit [he]96-amherst found [the two ladies]319-the two ladies together , and [Mrs. Ansell]178-mrs. ansell 's smile of approval seemed to cast a social sanction on the episode , to classify it as comfortably usual and unimportant . [He]96-amherst could see that [[her]178-mrs. ansell friend]706-her friend 's manner put [Bessy]125-bessy at ease , helping [her]104-westmore to ask [her]104-westmore own questions , and to reflect on [his]96-amherst suggestions , with less bewilderment and more self - confidence . [Mrs. Ansell]178-mrs. ansell had the faculty of restoring to [her]178-mrs. ansell the belief in [her]178-mrs. ansell reasoning powers that [[her]178-mrs. ansell father]3496-her father could dissolve in a monosyllable . The talk , on this occasion , had turned mainly on the future of [the Dillon family]844-the dillon family , on the best means of compensating for the accident , and , incidentally , on the care of [the young children of [the mill - colony]846-the mill - colony]845-the young children of the mill - colony . Though [Amherst]96-amherst did not believe in the extremer forms of industrial paternalism , [he]96-amherst was yet of opinion that , where [married women]847-married women were employed , [the employer]3416-the employer should care for [[their]3416-the employer children]3580-their children . [He]96-amherst had been gradually , and somewhat reluctantly , brought to this conviction by the many instances of unavoidable neglect and suffering among [the children of [the women - workers at [Westmore]104-westmore]851-the women - workers at westmore]850-the children of the women - workers at westmore ; and [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore took up the scheme with all the ardour of [her]104-westmore young motherliness , quivering at the thought of [hungry or ailing children]852-hungry or ailing children while [[her]104-westmore Cicely]853-her cicely , leaning a silken head against [her]104-westmore , lifted puzzled eyes to [her]104-westmore face . On the larger problems of the case it was less easy to fix [Bessy]125-bessy 's attention ; but [Amherst]96-amherst was far from being one of the extreme theorists who reject temporary remedies lest [they]854-they defer the day of general renewal , and since [he]96-amherst looked on every gain in the material condition of the mill - hands as a step in [their]854-they moral growth , [he]96-amherst was quite willing to hold back [his]96-amherst fundamental plans while [he]96-amherst discussed the establishment of [a nursery]855-a nursery , and of [a night - school for [the boys in [the mills]3324-the mills]857-the boys in the mills]856-a night - school for the boys in the mills . The third time [he]96-amherst called , [he]96-amherst found [Mr. Langhope]120-mr. langhope and [[Mr. Halford]110-mr. gaines Gaines of [the company]3366-the company]859-mr. halford gaines of the company . [The President of [the Westmore mills]3336-the westmore mills]861-the president of the westmore mills was [a trim middle - sized man , whose high pink varnish of good living would have turned to purple]863-a trim middle - sized man , whose high pink varnish of good living would have turned to purple could [he]96-amherst have known [Mr. Langhope]120-mr. langhope 's opinion of [his]96-amherst jewelled shirt - front and the padded shoulders of [his]96-amherst evening - coat . Happily [he]96-amherst had no inkling of these views , and was fortified in [his]96-amherst command of the situation by an unimpaired confidence in [his]96-amherst own appearance ; while [Mr. Langhope]120-mr. langhope , discreetly withdrawn behind a veil of cigar - smoke , let [his]120-mr. langhope silence play like a fine criticism over the various phases of the discussion . It was a surprise to [Amherst]96-amherst to find [himself]96-amherst in [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines 's presence . [The President]789-the president , secluded in [[his]789-the president high office]865-his high office , seldom visited [the mills]3324-the mills , and when there showed no consciousness of any presence lower than [Truscomb]105-truscomb 's ; and [Amherst]96-amherst 's first thought was that , in [the manager]3346-the manager 's enforced absence , [he]96-amherst was to be called to account by [the head of [the firm]869-the firm]868-the head of the firm . But [he]96-amherst was affably welcomed by [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines , who made it clear that [his]110-mr. gaines ostensible purpose in coming was to hear [Amherst]96-amherst 's views as to the proposed [night - schools]870-night - schools and [nursery]871-nursery . These were pointedly alluded to as [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore 's projects , and [the young man]426-the young man was made to feel that [he]426-the young man was merely called in as [a temporary adviser]873-a temporary adviser in [Truscomb]105-truscomb 's absence . This was , in fact , the position [Amherst]96-amherst preferred to take , and [he]96-amherst scrupulously restricted [himself]96-amherst to the answering of questions , letting [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore unfold [his]96-amherst plans as though they had been [her]104-westmore own . " It is much better , "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst reflected , " that [they]3807-they should all think so , and [she]104-westmore too , for [Truscomb]105-truscomb will be on [his]105-truscomb legs again in a day or two , and then [my]96-amherst hours will be numbered . "[96-amherst] Meanwhile [he]96-amherst was surprised to find [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines oddly amenable to the proposed innovations , which [he]110-mr. gaines appeared to regard as new fashions in [mill]3644-mill - management , to be adopted for the same cogent reasons as a new cut in coat - tails . " Of course [we]3808-we want to be up - to - date -- there 's no reason why [the Westmore mills]3336-the westmore mills should n't do as well by [[their]3336-the westmore mills people]3810-their people as [any mills in [the country]3812-the country]3811-any mills in the country , "[96-amherst] [he]96-amherst affirmed , in the tone of [the entertainer accustomed to say]875-the entertainer accustomed to say : " [I]96-amherst want the thing done handsomely . "[96-amherst] But [he]96-amherst seemed even less conscious than [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore that each particular wrong could be traced back to a radical vice in the system . [He]96-amherst appeared to think that every murmur of assent to [her]104-westmore proposals passed the sponge , once for all , over the difficulty propounded : as though a problem in algebra should be solved by wiping it off the blackboard . " [[My]110-mr. gaines dear]3368-my dear [Bessy]125-bessy , [we]3808-we all owe [you]125-bessy a debt of gratitude for coming here , and bringing , so to speak , a fresh eye to bear on the subject . If [I]110-mr. gaines 've been , perhaps , a little too exclusively absorbed in making [the mills]3324-the mills profitable , [[my]110-mr. gaines friend]3815-my friend [Langhope]120-mr. langhope will , [I]110-mr. gaines believe , not be the first to -- er -- cast a stone at [me]110-mr. gaines . "[110-mr. gaines] [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines , who was [the soul of delicacy]876-the soul of delicacy , stumbled a little over the awkward associations connected with [this figure]877-this figure , but , picking [himself]110-mr. gaines up , hastened on to affirm : " And in that respect , [I]110-mr. gaines think [we]3808-we can challenge comparison with any industry in [the state]3816-the state ; but [I]110-mr. gaines am the first to admit that there may be another side , a side that it takes [a woman]3817-a woman -- [a mother]3818-a mother -- to see . And if [you]3820-you 'll permit [me]110-mr. gaines to say so , "[110-mr. gaines] [he]110-mr. gaines went on , encouraged by the felicity of [his]110-mr. gaines image , " [I]110-mr. gaines believe it will produce a most pleasing effect -- not only on [the operatives]3426-the operatives [themselves]3426-the operatives , but on the whole of [Hanaford]1-hanaford -- on [[our]3822-our own set of [people]3450-people]3823-our own set of people especially -- to have [you]3820-you come here and interest [yourself]3820-you in the -- er -- philanthropic side of the work . "[110-mr. gaines] It was difficult to reconcile this large view of the moral issue with the existence of abuses which made the management of [the Westmore mills]3336-the westmore mills as unpleasantly notorious in [one section of [the community]3685-the community]880-one section of the community as it was agreeably notable in another . [But Amherst]96-amherst was impartial enough to see that [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines was unconscious of the incongruities of the situation . [He]110-mr. gaines left the reconciling of [incompatibles]882-incompatibles to [Truscomb]105-truscomb with the simple faith of [the believer]883-the believer committing a like task to [[his]883-the believer maker]884-his maker : it was in [the manager]3346-the manager 's mind that the dark processes of adjustment took place . [Mr. Gaines]110-mr. gaines cultivated the convenient and popular idea that by ignoring wrongs one is not so much condoning as actually denying [their]886-their existence ; and in pursuance of this belief [he]110-mr. gaines devoutly abstained from studying the conditions at [Westmore]104-westmore . A farther surprise awaited [Amherst]96-amherst when [Truscomb]105-truscomb reappeared in [the office]3467-the office . [The manager]3346-the manager was always [a man of few words]889-a man of few words ; and for the first days [his]3346-the manager intercourse with [[his]3346-the manager assistant]436-his assistant was restricted to asking questions and issuing orders . Soon afterward , it became known that [Dillon]98-dillon 's arm was to be amputated , and that afternoon [Truscomb]105-truscomb was summoned to see [Mrs. Westmore]104-westmore . When [he]105-truscomb returned [he]105-truscomb sent for [Amherst]96-amherst ; and [the young man]426-the young man felt sure that [his]426-the young man hour had come . [He]426-the young man was at dinner when the message reached [him]426-the young man , and [he]426-the young man knew from the tightening of [[his]426-the young man mother]396-his mother 's lips that [she]396-his mother too interpreted it in the same way . [He]426-the young man was glad that [Duplain]138-duplain 's presence kept [her]396-his mother from speaking [her]396-his mother fears ; and [he]426-the young man thanked [her]396-his mother inwardly for the smile with which [she]396-his mother watched [him]426-the young man go . That evening , when [he]426-the young man returned , the smile was still at its post ; but it dropped away wearily as [he]426-the young man said , with [his]426-the young man hands on [her]396-his mother shoulders : " Do n't worry , [mother]3466-mother ; [I]426-the young man do n't know exactly what 's happening , but [we]3827-we 're not blacklisted yet . "[426-the young man] [Mrs. Amherst]117-mrs. amherst had immediately taken up [her]117-mrs. amherst work , letting [her]117-mrs. amherst nervous tension find its usual escape through [her]117-mrs. amherst finger - tips . [Her]396-his mother needles flagged as [she]117-mrs. amherst lifted [her]117-mrs. amherst eyes to [his]426-the young man . " Something _ is _ happening , then ?
